data.eml:eml: Some taxonomic and nomenclatural changes in American Mantodea (Insecta, Dictyoptera) — Part I

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Agudelo, Antonio A., Rivera, Julio (2015): Some taxonomic and nomenclatural changes in American Mantodea (Insecta, Dictyoptera) — Part I. Zootaxa 3936 (3): 335-356, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3936.3.2
